data.message: This? This really? That's how half to country sends Mother day flowers to their mom's? Don't get me started on the Valentines day thing. Here's an idea. Get off the messenger and talk to people on the phone or in person.  Not once have I loaded this and have gotten it to work from my phones. Now I have 7 phones so explain that. I am happy for all these happy people.  Out it in my browser or how about when I open Facebook from my phone it just opens like on a regular computer. How about that?
